column2:
"..Yes, I understand. Well then,
next time I shall visit in
person to explain the situation."

"Please, don't worry. After all,
I can't just leave issues over there
alone. ..Until next time."

"Mr. Ardem? Did anything happen
relating to Mother Cluster?"

"No, it's something unrelated.
It's about the matter of mediating disputes
relating to the Middle East."

"The leaders there are making
unreasonable demands with one another
and asked if we could step in."

"Huh, like the ones that are
occasionally reported in the news?
Earth Guide is involved with that too?"

"Of course we are, originally Earth Guide's
mission was mainly to resolve conflicts
and lay the foundations for peace."

"Our fight with Mother Cluster,
is the real oddity here."

"Although, if we look at Earth Guide's
history, our dealings with other
countries' affairs are strange as well."

"Earth Guide was founded to guide the
world to the right path, behind the scenes."

"Back then, our modus operandi was to
investigate and deal with the paranormal.
Thus, we never really took off."

"It's only recently... that people have
regularly fought amongst each other, thus
our focus changed to dealing with people."

"It's said that the history of man,
is a history of conflict. I believe
that it is rather depressing."

"With my hands and my influence,
I hope to change things, even just
a little... heh. It just doesn't go well."
